title: 404 Cinema
description: A web application for browsing movies, managing sessions, and booking tickets. Built using a 3-layer architecture (Presentation, Business Logic, Data Access) following the MVC pattern.

title: Taskly
description: A project for task creation and management, implemented using a 3-layer architecture.
